mapper.select: SELECT q.question_number, q.question_type_code, q.text, q.attachment_file, subject_name(q.subject_code) AS subject_name, detail_subject_name(q.detail_subject_code) AS detail_subject_name, q.difficulty_code, q.answer, q.option1, q.option2, q.option3, q.option4, q.instructor_number, i.name AS instructor_name, q.explanation FROM question q JOIN instructor i ON q.instructor_number = i.instructor_number ORDER BY q.question_number

SELECT question_number, question_type_code, text, attachment_file, subject_name(subject_code) AS subject_name, detail_subject_name(detail_subject_code) AS detail_subject_name, answer, option1, option2, option3, option4, instructor_number, explanation FROM question WHERE question_number = #{questionNumber}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(question_number), 0) + 1 FROM question
INSERT INTO question ( question_number, question_type_code, text, attachment_file, subject_code, detail_subject_code, difficulty_code, answer, option1, option2, option3, option4, instructor_number, explanation ) VALUES ( #{questionNumber}, #{questionTypeCode}, #{text}, #{attachmentFile}, #{subjectCode}, #{detailSubjectCode}, #{difficultyCode}, #{answer}, #{option1}, #{option2}, #{option3}, #{option4}, #{instructorNumber}, #{explanation} )
mapper.update: UPDATE question SET question_type_code = #{questionTypeCode}, text = #{text}, attachment_file = #{attachmentFile}, subject_code = #{subjectCode}, detail_subject_code = #{detailSubjectCode}, difficulty_code = #{difficultyCode}, answer = #{answer}, option1 = #{option1}, option2 = #{option2}, option3 = #{option3}, option4 = #{option4}, explanation = #{explanation} WHERE question_number = #{questionNumber}
